segments.text: Why don ’ t we go for Teppanyaki tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmm ... to be honest , I ’ d rather go for a pizza .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I haven ’ t had a pizza for a while . Let ’ s do that then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , shall we go to Pizza Hut or Pizza Italia ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If it were up to me , I ’ d prefer to go to Pizza Hut . The toppings are much tastier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you ’ re absolutely right . Ok , that ’ s decided then !
segments.speaker: S2
